title: HF(aq) + H 2 O(l) ⇄ H 3 O + (aq) + F - (aq) ) + H

content.question: The dissociation of the weak acid HF in water is represented by the equation above. Adding a 1.0 mL sample of which of the following would increase the percent ionization of HF(aq) in 10 mL of a solution of 1.0 M HF ?

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
